# UITabBar.ItemPositioning.fill

**Case**

Distribute items across the entire width of the tab bar.

## Declaration

```swift
case fill
```

## Discussion

When the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar/ItemPositioning-swift.enum/automatic] option is selected, the tab bar uses this behavior in horizontally compact environments.

## Constants

- **UITabBar.ItemPositioning.automatic**: Specifies automatic tab bar item positioning according to the user interface idiom, as follows:
- **UITabBar.ItemPositioning.centered**: Center items in the available space.
